sprite.name: Komboo
sprite.notes: A walking giant kelp-like creatures with eyes.</br>Their name is likely a reference to kombu, a variety of seaweed used extensively in Japanese cuisine.

dualbox.comment: Determines if the Komboo will be small or big.

sprite.name: Komboo Spawner
sprite.notes: If the player swims to this spawning point, Komboos will emerge and start walking in a swaying motion towards the player with their four legs so their bodies can hit him accordingly, and attempt to swarm the player.

dualbox.comment: Determines if the Komboos will be small or big.

value.title: Spawn Count
value.comment: How many Komboos are allowed to spawn.
